```{r fig.width=8, fig.height=5, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# ============================
# Simulaci√≥n: switching dependiente de respuesta
# ============================

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)

set.seed(123)

n <- 400

# Asignaci√≥n inicial (0 = Control, 1 = Experimental)
grupo_inicial <- rbinom(n, 1, 0.5)

baseline <- rnorm(n, mean = 50, sd = 10)

# Respuesta intermedia
intermedio <- baseline +
  ifelse(grupo_inicial == 1,
         rnorm(n, 4, 3),
         rnorm(n, 1.5, 3))

# Switching en no respondedores del control
switch <- grupo_inicial == 0 & (intermedio - baseline) < 3

grupo_final <- case_when(
  grupo_inicial == 1 ~ "Experimental",
  switch ~ "Switch",
  TRUE ~ "Control"
)

# Resultado final
final <- intermedio +
  ifelse(grupo_final == "Experimental", rnorm(n, 2, 3),
         ifelse(grupo_final == "Switch", rnorm(n, 4.5, 3),
                rnorm(n, 0.5, 3)))

data <- data.frame(
  grupo_final,
  baseline,
  intermedio,
  final
)

# Resumen para gr√°fico (orden expl√≠cito)
summary_data <- data %>%
  group_by(grupo_final) %>%
  summarise(
    baseline = mean(baseline),
    intermedio = mean(intermedio),
    final = mean(final),
    .groups = "drop"
  ) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = c(baseline, intermedio, final),
    names_to = "Tiempo",
    values_to = "Media"
  )

# Orden temporal expl√≠cito e inamovible
summary_data <- summary_data %>%
  mutate(
    Tiempo = factor(
      Tiempo,
      levels = c("baseline", "intermedio", "final"),
      labels = c("Baseline", "Intermedio", "Final")
    )
  )

# Gr√°fico
ggplot(summary_data,
       aes(x = Tiempo,
           y = Media,
           group = grupo_final,
           color = grupo_final)) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1.2) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 13) +
  labs(
    title = "Switching dependiente de respuesta: alteraci√≥n estructural",
    x = "Momento de medici√≥n",
    y = "Media del outcome",
    color = "Grupo final"
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold")
  )


```
